description: image of various documents printed in German, including newspapers, pamphlets and scraps of handwritten papers; central handwritten folded letter with broken red wax seal; map at right edge; image of a figure in profile in LRQ, upside down, with a heart in front of his face; sheet music at bottom center
medium: Pen and ink and wash, with touches of color on paper
provenance: (Galerie Gunzen Hauser, Munich, until 1967; sold, in summer, for $112.50, to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara, Calif. (1967-d.2010); bequeathed to MIA, 2012
title: Trompe L'Oeil
